00074                         virtual void setBlending(BlendingMode blendMode);

00158             inline void GLRenderer::enableBlending(bool blendingEnabled)
00159             {
00160                         this->blendingEnabled = blendingEnabled;
00161             }
00162 
00163             inline void GLRenderer::setBlendingFunctions(GLuint src,GLuint dest)
00164             {
00165                         srcBlending = src;
00166                         destBlending = dest;
00167             }
00168 
00169             inline void GLRenderer::setTextureBlending(GLuint textureBlending)
00170             {
00171                         this->textureBlending = textureBlending;
00172             }
00173 
00174             inline bool GLRenderer::isBlendingEnabled() const
00175             {
00176                         return blendingEnabled;
00177             }
00178 
00179             inline GLuint GLRenderer::getSrcBlendingFunction() const
00180             {
00181                         return srcBlending;
00182             }
00183 
00184             inline GLuint GLRenderer::getDestBlendingFunction() const
00185             {
00186                         return destBlending;
00187             }
00188 
00189             inline GLuint GLRenderer::getTextureBlending() const
00190             {
00191                         return textureBlending;
00192             }
00193 
00194             inline void GLRenderer::initBlending() const
00195             {
00196                         if (blendingEnabled)
00197                         {
00198                                     glBlendFunc(srcBlending,destBlending);
00199                                     glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00200                         }
00201                         else
00202                                     glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00203             }
00204 
00205             inline void GLRenderer::initRenderingHints() const
00206             {
00207                         // alpha test
00208                         if (isRenderingHintEnabled(ALPHA_TEST))
00209                         {
00210                                     glAlphaFunc(GL_GEQUAL,getAlphaTestThreshold());
00211                                     glEnable(GL_ALPHA_TEST);
00212                         }
00213                         else
00214                                     glDisable(GL_ALPHA_TEST);
00215 
00216                         // depth test
00217                         if (isRenderingHintEnabled(DEPTH_TEST))
00218                                     glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00219                         else
00220                                     glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00221 
00222                         // depth write
00223                         glDepthMask(isRenderingHintEnabled(DEPTH_WRITE));
00224             }
